name: Prevense Apricot and Almond Face Wash
description: Dry Skin: this mild, non toxic face wash will cleanse your skin without irritating the skin. Enriched Apricot kernel oil will retain elasticity, while Almond oil will re-moisturize the skin, leaving the skin soft and supple. Ingredients: Apricot, Kernel Oil, Vitamin A, C, D, E, Almond oil.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
